team.name: Emma Carter
team.description: Emma turned her family farm into a cozy guesthouse where guests can relax and reconnect with nature. She loves sharing stories and homemade recipes

team.name: Liam Brooks
team.description: Liam ensures the farm runs smoothly, from taking care of the animals to maintaining the gardens. He enjoys teaching guests about sustainable farming.

team.name: Sophia Reynolds
team.description: Sophia organizes farm tours, local excursions, and seasonal events to make every stay unforgettable. She's passionate about hospitality and nature.

team.name: Noah Bennett
team.description: Noah creates farm-to-table meals using fresh produce from the garden. His breakfasts and homemade jams are guest favorites!
